title: Can I get admission to LUMS? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can definitely get in there :) However, Your scores in Matric and Fsc aren’t that good. While, they haven’t mentioned anything like this in their admission criteria, they definitely give some weight to your academic performance in Matric/Fsc/O-A Levels. With your academic record, my advice will be to get least 1600 (Aim 1800) in SAT before applying to LUMS. Take some time off, keep practicing, and when you hit around 1800 in practice tests, take your exam. Best of Luck :)
It’s fine If you score 1300+ (600+ in Evidence based reading and writing section) Don’t forget to get some of the best recommendation letters and a pursuing personal statement.
